title: Pixel 2 on Google logo screen loop mode post latest Android Security Update. Bootloading not working
content:
After installing the Android/Pixel security updates for December 2019, Pixel 2 device stopped functioning. 
It is stuck now on the Google animation loop mode, refuses to power on or start through the bootloader. 
Within the bootloader, Recovery Mode doesn't work either -- any press of the button results in screen blacking out, and turning back on to the Google logo/white screen. 
This Google logo/white screen keeps going on and off constantly.
When connected to charger, the battery sign shows and then disappears to show a black screen
Have tried pressing Power On - holding 30 seconds; multiple times -- no change
Have tried Power Off on bootloader, and then restarting -- no change
Took the phone to different servicing shops, and they are unable to solve the issue
Hard / soft reset option not available either

Any suggestions on what to do next? Thanks!
